Description of incident: A former loan officer took files from WJB's computer systems while she was still employed.  The loan officer then left WJB and another mortgage company ended up with the information in late July and early August of 2013.  Client names, Social Security numbers, credit reports, bank account information, tax information, and other sensitive information related to loan applications was taken.  The information was eventually retrieved and removed from the systems of the unnamed mortage company.
